channel.title: Changing Item Prices In Shops
channel.description:
Ive only seen one tutorial and I tried to follow it but it was bogus and I just cant find the file with item prices in it.
Someone help me out? I looked through all the files I could think of Item1,item2,item3,item4,ITEMS,ItemHandler all kindsa junk.
Just tell me where you think it is or something. Im sick of bandos being so cheap on my server... (Using hah bah gee source)

item.title: Changing Item Prices In Shops
item.dc:creator: @X_F_U_R_Y_X X F U R Y X
item.description:
@X_F_U_R_Y_X wrote:

Goto you item.java, find the item you wish to change your price to (By pressing Ctrl + F and searching the item’s name of ID.)

Then you should see many numbers after the Item name and Description. There should actually be 15 numbers each separated by an indent, the first 3 numbers should in the following order:

High Alch Price.
Shop Price.
And Low Alch Price.

After those numbers will be the stats of the item if worn, it should go in order down and back to the top and the Other Bonus’s are the last 2.

Good luck.

Read full topic
